amendment.description: To allow the Secretary to accept and expend non-Federal amounts for repair, restoration, or replacement of certain water resources projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 867 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 867 proposed by Senator Vitter for Senator Inhofe.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 867 proposed by Senator Vitter for Senator Inhofe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 867 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
